Because your behaviour show the things that are not wanted by community and.u got the.minimum punishment  to remind u to change
Because some people believe their chat to not be bad enough to warrant a punishment. Which is to be expected since most people believe their own behavior to be acceptable.

The reform card shows you 1-5 recent games **as examples** of unacceptable behavior, it doesn't mean that you were judged and punished solely based on that one game.

If you send a ticket to https://support.riotgames.com ,  you can ask them how many games you were validly reported and get to know how often your behavior crossed the line.
